title: FORMAT_DSP_TEMPLATE
description: Parses and formats a DSP (Data Sync Pro) template string by resolving all embedded expressions and placeholders.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: A string containing merge fields or expressions in DSP template syntax (e.g. {!FieldName}, {VLOOKUP(...)}) to be evaluated and replaced with their corresponding values.

examples:
FORMAT_DSP_TEMPLATE("{FirstName}")  
-- Returns the value of the FirstName field from the current context.  
-- For example, if FirstName = "Jordan", it returns "Jordan".

FORMAT_DSP_TEMPLATE("The stage of the latest opportunity is {VLOOKUP(\"Opportunity\", \"StageName\", \"AccountId\", Id)}")
-- Parses and formats the string by resolving the VLOOKUP expression inside the template.
-- For example, if the current record's Id matches an Opportunity with StageName = "Negotiation", it returns:
-- "The stage of the latest opportunity is Negotiation"
